original_text: Later, Jesus and his disciples were leaving Jericho. A large crowd of people followed him.
korean_text: 그들이 여리고에서 떠나 갈 때에 큰 무리가 예수를 따르더라

sentences.original_text: Later, Jesus and his disciples were leaving Jericho.
sentences.korean_translation: 후에, 예수님과 그의 제자들이 여리고를 떠나고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: A large crowd of people followed him.
